name: Entombed (itch) (AlecDuval)
description:
You are an adventurer that wants to explore a deep tomb that's been uncovered. Unfortunately, it's overrun with monsters, creatures, and trapped humans. Do you have what it takes to escape, and what are you willing to do to win?

For the B3agz Game Jam #2.

Artist: Jaden (did pretty much all artwork and animation)

Programmers: Erik (procedural map and altars), Alec (generally everything)

Music: Erik (made using Music Maker Jam)

Playtesters: Adam (speedran a version of our game in under 2 minutes)

- - - - - SPOILERS - - - - -

This game is designed to see how people react to sacrificing human life for money and power (via gold and altars). Obviously, once you know of this, it's not going to have as much of an impact, however, I thought it might be interesting to see what people do with minimal understanding of how this game works.
